title: Bulk Collection Debate Highlights Need To Revise Patriot Act
teaser: NPR's Audie Cornish interviews Kim Zetter, a senior staff reporter at Wired magazine, who says the debate in Congress over the NSA's bulk collection program shows the Patriot Act needs to be revised.
